website_summaries.verdict: This LEGO set starts as an engaging challenge when you’re setting the many fine details of the Empire State Building, but the completed model is an impressive sight to see.
pros: Assemble 5 pieces of iconic NYC architecture, including The Statue of Liberty and Chrysler Building

customer_reviews.title: tiny pieces, really cool
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9-year-old grandson for Christmas. He dumped out all the bags of almost 600 tiny pieces onto our dining room table, and proceeded to put these buildings together, using the included instructions, which are in a bound booklet. I have no idea how he found each piece that he needed, but he didn't seem to have trouble. It took him a couple of hours. The buildings are to scale. I only wish the Statue of Liberty was a little more realistic, but it is a minor issue. Our grandson really loved it, and it was a great holiday activity.
customer_reviews.author: Never Too Old To LearnTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Lego quality PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! I Bought it after our honeymoon in New York and me and my wife planned to display it in our living room as memorabilia reminding us of our great time in this magical city and it was the perfect piece for that. building it was simple and fun, the quality is the known and respected Lego quality, very durable and very beautiful. I Recommend it for any fan of Lego, architect or New York.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Al Negedan

customer_reviews.title: Challenging
customer_reviews.text: This one was the most challenging one so far. You really have to concentrate on what you are doing as some of the buildings have so many intricate details and there was a part where you had to build a part then build a mirror image and make sure they connected together in just the right way so it was symmetrical. The one issue I have is that the buildings are so intricately built on the inside then at the end they just want you to slap on huge pieces to cover up all the intricate work you just did
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: He was able to put it together by himself and it was perfect for his project
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son put this set together for his class project about New York. He was able to put it together by himself and it was perfect for his project. We will definitely be ordering more of the architecture Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a LEGO Architecture fan, but a departure from normal scale
customer_reviews.text: As an adult fan of LEGO and an avid collector of the architecture models, I had to have this set (I have them all). I'm still on the fence about the design, simply because the skylines were a departure from the standard line, and incorporate many of the same buildings already available in a much larger scale LEGO kit. This was a fun build though and remains true to the architecture line build techniques and style.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Wiest

customer_reviews.title: Well made, looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grandson was thrilled to get this for Hanukkah.I bought the lights set for it as well. It was easy for him to put it together. It looks so beautiful when it is finished. Very well made , the only negative comment from him was he wished the statue of liberty was bigger
customer_reviews.author: SOgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to build this set with my son but it seems to be missing a whole bag of pieces. I also have pieces not needed. Perhaps I got two of the same bags? I have two Statues for the Statue of Liberty but the instruction book indicates I’d only get one. We cannot finish the Empire State Building or the Freedom Tower. Super disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Boi
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 15 year old who has been obsessed with Legos and NYC for a long time. I really liked the simplicity of the skyline but the one thing that I wouldn’t say was wrong, but just not what I was expecting was the size of figure of the Statue of Liberty. When I looked online you can assume that it would be the same size as a normal LEGO figure but it was much smaller. Now it does look to scale but when I was opening it my mom and I were dying laughing at how small it was😂. Also I got 2 Statue of Libertys not a problem just kinda odd.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful LEGO NYC skyline
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my grandson for his 14th birthday. He recently received a similar one, Shanghai skyline. I was amazed at the detail and ease of assembly for a budding graphic artist and architect. A huge win for LEGO and the Architect series
customer_reviews.author: MSull

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: This set was missing a few pieces which we just took from other lego sets to complete. But for the extremely high cost there should not be missing pieces. Even though these sets are considered collectors items they should not cost as much as they do. My daughter would love to have more sets but there is no way she will ever save up enough money to buy them. These sets are not for young children unless they have a lot of patience with large sets.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lego set.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I'm hanging onto an unopened set. I think it will appreciate in price once they Lego stops selling these. Some sets go up, others do not. But this seems like one of the good ones. Plus, this set sells for $59.99 most places. Amazon's price fluctuates, but it was $48.99 when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The New York Skyline buildings set is really good! I only put a 3 for ease to assemble which I think is a good thing. We didn't want it to be too easy and it wasn't. But it also isn't too hard where you just get frustrated and say forget it. We like to put things like this together then study the buildings and areas around them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A Gift Hit
customer_reviews.text: This was a holiday gift for my not-quite-12-year old grandson. It's what he wanted. He loved it and immediately put it together. He'd love to have more sets but at the price, they're not something I can only afford to give him Legos on gift occasions.
customer_reviews.author: anita joy delight

customer_reviews.title: Great Stocking Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a stocking stuffer to an engineer who use to live in NYC. First comment was the narrow base, so he recognized that this would be put on a shelf once built. Can't miss with Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Mark36

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but a few things could be a little better
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked the statue of Lilberty to be a little larget and more detailed. Some of the instructions are a little hard to figure out. Overall it looks really nice when all completed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Levi

customer_reviews.title: Love! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is obsessed with building LEGO architecture buildings. He built this in 4 1/2 hours. This was a beatiful piece, and now we will buying the light sets.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: Great for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: A great distraction amid my coronavirus anxiety. Easy to put together. All the pieces were there and instructions were simple to follow. My 6 yo son even helped :)
customer_reviews.author: beeeeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacation-themed gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just finished a vacation with family in New York City and this was the perfect birthday gift to follow up the trip. I hope they continue to add new cities and destinations.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: As usual lego is my son's favorite. He just loves building blocks. As soon as he opened it he finished in 30 minutes. He has the NYC lego on the dressing table just on the front. It looks like its a souvenir.
customer_reviews.author: HarpritSingh.us

customer_reviews.title: Pieces are missing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item!!! My son just tried to put it together and he got to the end and couldn't finish because there wasn't enough pieces. It's crap!!!

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I could assemble this but my 8 year old grandson did with the lighting kit all on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical, high-quality LEGO unit
customer_reviews.text: We gave one of these to an adult who works in NYC, and another to an experienced 9 year old LEGO builder. Both are pleased with the kit. They aren't shy about their pricing, but for sure their units never disappoint quality-wise
customer_reviews.author: WI woodworker

customer_reviews.title: My 16 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: LEGO never disappoints! The size is small so pay attention to that if you want a bigger product. Easy to assemble for her age. Lovely NYC skyline.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Plyler

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and easy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: WAY smaller than expected! I should have checked the specs better, but for the price we were expecting more. My 8 year old son just laughed when he saw the set! $50 for about 10 min of entertainment...
customer_reviews.author: STB

customer_reviews.title: Small lego set, big price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sons 14th birthday. He loved this gift. Very easy to assemble, instructions were accurate the only downfall was the size of this lego set for the price. It is beautiful and looks reaIistic but I feel that it should have been cheaper for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: #1AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Cool and iconic NYC skyscraper lego set; fun to build
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo son loved this for Christmas; he is really into architecture and enjoyed the challenge of putting this together. He is looking forward to getting all of these (of course)!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for Xmas who is 6 yrs old. He had just taken a trip to the city. He loved it. Completed it in about 3 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Statue of Liberty needed to improve

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and he loved it! It is pretty small but it is a great gift for any age! My boyfriend is 29 and he absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Thomas

customer_reviews.title: We loved it. Has some great details
customer_reviews.text: We loved it. No problem for my 8 and 10 year-old's to put together. Has some great details. The Empire State Building and One World Trade are both very good. The Chrysler Building (my favorite) is a little clunky at the top, missing the elegance of the real thing. The Lego figure Statute of Liberty is cool, but should have an arm up and a torch. As a New Yorker, loved that the Flatiron Building is included, but we were annoyed that the buildings are out of order, north to south, so we rearranged things. Added the reflecting pools at WTC as well.

product_meta.title: LEGO Architecture New York City 21028, Build It Yourself New York Skyline Model Kit for Adults and Kids (598 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Celebrate the architectural diversity of New York City with this detailed LEGO model building kit for adults. The LEGO Architecture Skyline Collection offers architecture models suitable for display in the home and office, and has been developed for all with an interest in travel, architectural culture, history and design. A collectible booklet containing information about the New York architecture is also included. Each building set is scaled to give an accurate representation of the comparative size of each model skyscraper and toy tower, with true-to-life color depiction. This building kit features the Flatiron Building, Chrysler Building, Empire State Building, One World Trade Center and the Statue of Liberty, and is finished with a decorative New York City nameplate to make the perfect gift.
feature_bullets: Creative builders will love bringing the Big Apple to life with this detailed model of the New York City Skyline, The model skyscrapers and towers within this building kit allow you to recreate the magic of the city that never sleeps

This model building kit features iconic New York architecture including the Statue of Liberty, Flatiron Building, Chrysler Building, Empire State Building, and the One World Trade Center; each architecture model scaled for an accurate representation

Whether this set is an architecture model for adults or a toy building gift for kids, it will provide endless hours of fun as the LEGO Architecture building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
This architecture toy also comes with a collectible booklet containing information about the design, architecture and history of these toy skyscrapers
New York City Skyline building toy measures 10 inches high, 9 inches wide, and 1 inch deep. This creative kit contains 598 pieces and is great for boys and girls over the age of 12 years old

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
